page.title: 03Newport Park Caravan Site
page.content:
Situated three miles from Exeter and one mile from Topsham on the River Exe. Newport Park has been a caravan park since 1930. The present owner bought in 1978 in a run down condition and has now developed it.(G.R. 954891)
There are about 175 homes on the site and most have quite large gardens. The homes are sold complete with garden shed, insurance, garden soil and turf. Most purchasers are retired or semi- retired and families with children under 16 are not accepted.
The homes have two bedrooms, lounge, dining area, kitchen and bathroom. They have natural gas central heating and are fitted with carpets, curtains and furniture. There is parking space for one car.
